ygData.subject: Re: evil in the light elf realm
ygData.msgSnippet: Fairly certain NO Orges and Trolls can. I had a Troll Shaman, he couldn t get NEAR the guards until I did the old (now changed) dwarven ale quest in the
ygData.messageBody:
Fairly certain NO Orges and Trolls can. I had a Troll Shaman, he couldn't
get NEAR the guards until I did the old (now changed) dwarven ale quest in
the underground about 160 times. unfortunately, it no longer affects your
Freeportmilitia faction. Dark Elves are different in this regard. They start
dubious to the guards.

Macabre
----- Original Message -----
From: Naeeldar <jackal@...>
To: <EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com>
Sent: Thursday, September 23, 1999 10:51 AM
Subject: Re: [EQ_Necromancer] evil in the light elf realm


> From: "Naeeldar" <jackal@...>
>
> Hmm not sure but I'm pretty sure trolls and ogres can walk through east
> freeport I know my Dark Elf Necromancer does and his faction has changed
at
> all.
>
> naeeldar
